mapper.select:
select data_id, base_id, standard_num, standard_name, standard_type, standard_leader, standard_time, standard_drafter, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, status, audit_status, update_user, update_date, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4 from laboratory_standard where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and base_id like '%${baseId}%'
and standard_num like '%${standardNum}%'
and standard_name like '%${standardName}%'
and standard_type like '%${standardType}%'
and standard_leader like '%${standardLeader}%'
and standard_time like '%${standardTime}%'
and standard_drafter like '%${standardDrafter}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
